## @(#) : editorconfig common template for atsushifx ## # @version 1.2.0 # @date 2025-01-31 # @author atsushifx <atsushuifx@gmail.com> # Common editor settings for general programming and documentation files. # Applies consistent indentation and line-ending rules. ### Base Settings # Markdown [*.md] indent_size = 2 tab_width = 2
